Game.Name: Pokémon Naranja
Game.Plot: Do you remember the Ash’s adventures in the Orange Islands? Now thanks to with the hack Pokémon Naranja, they are waiting for you in a video-game so that you’ll be able to walk the tropical archipelago just like it happened in the anime but at your very own rhythm. The second season of the Pokémon anime will return in Pokémon Naranja exactly like in the series but as a video game that you can play. Awesome and updated graphics, A Colorful world, Tropical Pokémon, Play as Ash or Misty, Anime series characters, Two movies: Mew VS Mewtwo and Pokémon 2000, New trainers,Special Pokémon, Spectacular maps, White sand, deep blue sea, palms… What are you waiting for? Placed in a tropical region never pictured in a game: The Orange Archipelago. The same plot of the anime, with all episodes included. Updated fauna with Hoenn, Johto and Kanto Pokémon. Four gyms with chalenges as in the anime. Harder difficult with more high level and more double battles. Moreover: 5 Sinnoh Pokémon + 2 new preevolutions + 2 new Unown. The archipielago’s Pokémon, as in the anime, have altered coloration.
